related_breaches.model_name: Unusual Activity / Unusual Activity from Re-Activated Device

ai_analyst_alert.summary:
The device 175.16.199.1 was observed making unusual internal SSH connections to a wide range of devices.

Though this behaviour could be the result of legitimate remote access or administration, it could also be a sign of attempted lateral movement by a compromised machine.

Consequently, if this activity was not expected, the security team may wish to investigate further.
ai_analyst_alert.title: Extensive Unusual SSH Connections

message:
The device 175.16.199.1 was observed making unusual internal SSH connections to a wide range of devices.

Though this behaviour could be the result of legitimate remote access or administration, it could also be a sign of attempted lateral movement by a compromised machine.

Consequently, if this activity was not expected, the security team may wish to investigate further.

name: Unusual Activity / Unusual Activity from Re-Activated Device
